/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/KAFKA.dir/main.cpp.o -o KAFKA   -L/root/kafka-cpp-getting-started/app_kafka_library  -L/root/kafka-cpp-getting-started/app_utils  -Wl,-rpath,/root/kafka-cpp-getting-started/app_kafka_library:/root/kafka-cpp-getting-started/app_utils:/root/kafka-cpp-getting-started/build/app_kafka_library/src:/root/kafka-cpp-getting-started/build/app_utils/src app_kafka_library/src/libapp_kafka_library.so app_utils/src/libapp_utils.so -lrdkafka++
